extension.name: S5 Image and Content Fader v3
extension.author: Shape5.com
extension.description: This module will display images of any url and user defined conent in one of 4 effect transitions. Choose between actual size and stretch for your images and enter in pixels or percentages for your width, great for responsive/fluid websites! Powered by Mootools/Jquery but if you experience conflicts you can enable legacy S5 Effects mode (contains less features than Mootools/Jquery version).

field.name: pretext
field.label: Pre-Text
field.description: Enter any pre-text message.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Enter the height of the image fader.

field.name: width
field.label: Width (ex. 482px or 100%)
field.description: Enter the width of the image fader in pixels or percentages for responsive/fluid style websites.

field.name: s5stretchimage
field.label: If above is percentage width, choose image style
field.description: This option allows you to have your images stretch to fit the width of the image fader for fluid or responsive websites. The images will continue to fit and stretch to whatever width you have set. Height is automatic. Images should all be the same height and width before you upload them, this module will not resize them to be equal. NOTE: Not compatibile with older browsers and some versions of IE. This feature should only be used if the template was designed with a responsive or fluid layout. Some templates contain module overrides where this feature is not available because the overrides were created before this feature was added.

field.name: s5pixelwidth
field.label: If Stretch to Fit is enabled: Enter in the width in pixels to disable stretching, ex 800px
field.description: If you are using a responsive style website you can enter in a max width here so your images will no longer stretch once the browser is shrunken to the specified width. If the browser size meets the specified width the height of the module will become the specified height parameter as well. To disable this function simply enter 0px

field.name: background
field.label: Background Color (leave blank for none) ex:FFFFFF
field.description: Enter the background color. Leave blank for none.

field.name: jslibrary
field.label: Choose Mootools or Legacy Mode (S5 Effects)
field.description: The Mootools/Jquery option has a directory slider and navigation arrows while s5 effects only displays the images and content. Mootools will be used in Joomla 2.5 and lower, and Jquery will be used in Joomla 3.0+

field.name: jseffect
field.label: Choose your effect (mootools/jquery version only)
field.description: Choose the effect you would like to happen between image transitions. Mootools/Jquery versions only, S5 effects will just fade in and out

field.name: s5_dropdowntext
field.label: Drop Tab
field.description: Enter the text for drop down gallery tab if enabled

field.name: s5_delay
field.label: Delay Time
field.description: Enter the time in milliseconds for slide delay

field.name: s5_hidecar
field.label: Enable or Disable the picture carousel
field.description: Choose to enable or disable the carousel drop down thumbnail pictures

field.name: s5_hidebut
field.label: Enable or Disable the navigation arrows
field.description: Choose to enable or disable the left and right navigation arrows

field.name: s5_hidetext
field.label: Enable or Disable the slide text
field.description: Choose to enable or disable the slide text that pops up during each slide transition
